description: Deletes attribute values from a user. This operation doesn't affect tokens for existing user sessions. The next ID token that the user receives will no longer have the deleted attributes.

parameters.name: UserPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the user pool where you want to delete user attributes.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The name of the user that you want to query or modify. The value of this parameter is typically your user's username, but it can be any of their alias attributes. If username isn't an alias attribute in your user pool, this value must be the sub of a local user or the username of a user from a third-party IdP.

parameters.name: UserAttributeNames
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the user attribute names you want to delete. For custom attributes, you must prepend the custom: prefix to the attribute name. (string) ---
